Trump proposes 15% cap on international students: Enrolment dips; budgets strain
description: The US is already seeing a sharp drop in international student enrolment ahead of a proposed 15% cap, with visa delays and restrictive policies deterring applicants. Asian and African student numbers have plunged, particularly at the graduate level, hitting research programmes and university budgets. Institutions like DePaul are cutting costs amid falling revenues. The proposed cap, paired with a 5% per-country limit, formalises a trend already underway, risking major economic and academic repercussions.

title: Big 4 visa overhaul 2025: Higher costs, tighter routes; what Indians must know
description: n 2025, global student and work visa rules are tightening, reshaping opportunities for international talent. The US imposed a $100,000 H-1B fee and fixed-term student stays, Canada reduced study permits and limited spousal work rights, the UK raised living-cost proofs and shortened post-study work, while Australia overhauled English-test rules. These changes directly affect finances, career paths, and long-term plans.

title: China refuses to buy US soybeans: Trump admin plans support for farmers

He hopes an upcoming Trump-Xi meeting will resolve the trade dispute, which has seen China use farmers as "pawns."

title: Watch: Explosion sparks fire at Chevron refinery in Los Angeles
description: A massive fire erupted at the Chevron refinery in El Segundo Thursday night following an explosion, sending bright flames and thick smoke visible for miles. Firefighters are working to contain the blaze at the large West Coast facility, though no injuries or evacuations have been reported. The cause of the incident remains unclear.

title: 'Drug kingpin': Ex-NSG commando held with 200kg ganja; was once part of 26/11 terror op
description: Former NSG commando Bajrang Singh, who participated in the 2008 Mumbai terror operation, was arrested in Rajasthan for allegedly masterminding a large-scale cannabis smuggling network. Police recovered 200kg of the drug, stating he was the kingpin transporting it from Telangana and Odisha. This arrest is a significant step against the terror-narcotics nexus.

BJP's Shehzad Poonawala swiftly condemned these remarks, questioning the Congress party's intentions. Raj further commented on India's foreign policy challenges, including a Taliban minister's visit and US tariffs, while dismissing reports of internal party conflict in Karnataka.

title: India-Russia trade: Putin orders to step up imports; ‘losses faced by India due to US tariffs…’

This move aims to address the trade imbalance caused by India's substantial crude oil purchases, especially as India faces US tariffs.

Owaisi also questioned the government's law and order record, citing recent demolitions.

Her persistence stemmed from building her career from scratch.

title: 'Lost balance': How a single misstep turned fatal during Durga idol immersion in MP; 11 dead
description: Eleven youths, including eight minors, drowned on Thursday evening when a tractor-trolley carrying Durga idol immersion devotees overturned in a pond in Khandwa, Madhya Pradesh. The vehicle lost balance while reversing, despite a warning, leading to the tragic incident. Chief Minister Mohan Yadav announced Rs 4 lakh ex-gratia for each deceased family.

title: Paul Hughes vs Usman Nurmagomedov 2: Start time, fight card & viewing info
description: Paul Hughes is set for a highly anticipated rematch against the unbeaten lightweight champion Usman Nurmagomedov on 3rd October, 2025, in Dubai's Coca Cola Arena. Their first encounter was a dramatic and controversial affair, fueling expectations for this pivotal title fight. Streaming globally on DAZN, the event features a stacked card.

title: Taylor Swift blames Blake Lively for chaos after Travis Kelce arrest
description: Taylor Swift and Blake Lively's friendship faces strain. A legal battle involving Blake Lively led to Taylor Swift's deposition. A process server's arrest at Travis Kelce's home further complicated matters. Swift reportedly feels betrayed by these events. She now prioritizes safeguarding her relationship with Travis Kelce. The future of their high-profile friendship remains uncertain.
